title: Welcome to Learning With Data
description: Hey! I wanted to take a moment to welcome you to the Learning with Data community! I hope you enjoyed the 5-Step Process for Creating an Amazing Data Science Portfolio. The feedback has been super positive. One user even said the guide was “brilliant!”
dc:creator: Tyler Folkman
content:encoded:
Hey!

I wanted to take a moment to welcome you to the Learning with Data community! I hope you enjoyed the 5-Step Process for Creating an Amazing Data Science Portfolio.

The feedback has been super positive. One user even said the guide was “brilliant!”

If you have not seen the guide yet, you can grab a copy here.

What you can expect from joining our community is simple: help to become the best data scientist possible.

My goal is to provide you all the resources you need to constantly be growing and leveling up your skills.

To that end, please take less than a minute to answer this 1 question survey. It is completely anonymous and asks you to rank various topics you want to learn about!

I will use these data to guide what content I create, so please vote for what you want to learn!

Take 1 Question Survey!

Thanks! And I look forward to us all growing together!

Tyler
